content: Nianrong Fang (方年容) is an undergraduate student currently majoring in Computer Science and Technology at ShanghaiTech University. Starting in 2024, he will embark on a journey towards earning his Ph.D. degree at Shanghai Jiao Tong University, under the guidance of Professor Yanyan Shen. His academic pursuits are driven by a profound interest in the fields of Quantitative Finance, Financial Technology (Fintech), Time Series Forecasting, and General Artificial Intelligence.
